185248894.review:
[h1]Summary[/h1]
Very short puzzle simulation based on Conway's Game of Life.

[b]Pros[/b]
+ Interesting

[b]Cons[/b]
- Not really a game
- Frustrating

[h1]Overview[/h1]
Bacteria is a super short puzzle simulation that's less of a game taking a little too much of the simulation part becoming a little frustrating to actually "play", it is still pretty interesting to watch each time you drop a cell and see what happens as it cascades through areas.
There are 2 game modes, a free simulation for you to mess around in and the puzzle levels. Gameplay practically boils down to placing single pixel cells and seeing how much cells already in the area are then effected and wiped to move on to the next levels. It will pretty much get very chaotic and difficult to control the cascading effects, so it is difficult for me to really call this a puzzle game.

Achievements are rather annoying as it isn't all to clear what to do to obtain them and how frustrating gameplay can be.

[hr][/hr]
If you find my reviews useful do follow my [b][url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/11028547-Dods-Echo-Chamber/]Curator[/url][/b] page for more!

183742829.review:
게임은 재미있어야하는데 그 재미를 느끼게 해주는 요소가 너무 많이 빠졌다.
하는 법은 다른 평가에서 보면 대충 알 수 있지만
'John Conway's Game of Life'의 시스템을 그대로 가져왔다.
검색해보면 원리는 알게 되지만 원리를 안다고 재밌어지진 않는다.
